name: 90'sMovieTrivia
0:
”Alexa open nineties movie trivia”
”Alexa play nineties movie trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nineties movie trivia
des:
90's Movie Trivia is a game that will put your movie knowledge to the test.

The game is simple to play, you pick a category and we put to together a list of 10 movies.
Each trivia question is plot about different the movie, guess the movie title.

Categories are comedy, drama, action and horror.
Season 1 of 90's Movie Trivia includes 100 trivia questions, 25 per category.

To start just say "Alexa open nineties movie trivia".
To choose a category say "comedy" or "category comedy".

This is a free to play game with the option to buy/unlock premium content.
Premium content includes hints, stats and in game rewards. Once premium content is unlock you will not get any repeat questions until the category has been completed.

Currently the in game rewards are badges, badges are unlocked/earned when you reach a milestone. 

The premium content for hints, stats and ability to earn in-game rewards is a one time purchase and gets you unlimited hints.

Put your skills to the test and answer all the questions in season 1....
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
